scripts.build: cml wx build && cml web build && cml weex build
scripts.publish-npm: sh ./bin/build.sh && node ./bin/build.js -npm && cd package && npm publish
scripts.publish-dnpm: sh ./bin/build.sh && node ./bin/build.js -dnpm && cd package && npm publish
scripts.deploy: sh deploy.sh weex && sh deploy.sh web
